function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of 2019-nCoV virus leading to global outbreak","Impact":"Mass infections and deaths, strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, increasing healthcare capacity","Technologies":"Telemedicine, contact tracing apps, quarantine and isolation facilities","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Dramatic changes in public and private life due to COVID-19","Impact":"Unprecedented disruptions to economies and labor markets","Mitigation":"Investing in economic support, remote work infrastructure, and retraining programs","Technologies":"Remote work tools, online learning platforms, economic stimulus packages","People":"Workers, businesses, students, labor markets","Owner":"Governments, businesses, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Rapid construction of emergency medical facility in response to pandemic","Impact":"Logistical and construction challenges, safety and quality concerns","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to safety regulations, quality assurance processes","Technologies":"Modular construction methods, remote monitoring and management systems","People":"Construction workers, healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Construction companies, healthcare organizations"}]}
